If approved, the merger would create the first true transcontinental rail carrier and significantly reduce competition in the industry.

result.text: OMAHA, Neb.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Union Pacific Railroad is proud to announce the distribution of more than $4 million in local grants to 430 nonprofit organizations through its Community Ties Giving Program. The awards reinforce Union Pacific's commitment to building strong, safe and sustainable communities across its 23-state network. result.text: TRUMAN, Minn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Central Farm Service (CFS), a farmer-owned cooperative in Minnesota & Iowa, and long-time Union Pacific customer, announced its support for the proposed merger of Union Pacific Railroad and Norfolk Southern Corporation. CFS believes this combination  creating America's first coast-to-coast railroad  will improve agricultural logistics by providing more efficient rail service from the Midwest to more markets nationwide. result.title: Union Pacific: An Undervalued Blue-Chip Stock Benefiting From Durable Competitive Advantages
result.text: Union Pacific, an American railroad holding company that serves as the holding company for the Union Pacific Railroad, is now a $134 billion (by market cap) railroad behemoth. UNP recently announced a deal to acquire the Eastern Class I railroad Norfolk Southern for $85 billion in an effort to create the country's first transcontinental railroad. UNP increased its dividend for 19 consecutive years, with a 10-year dividend growth rate of 11.3%.

result.title: Largest US rail union endorses Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern merger after job deal
result.text: The United States' largest railroad union, SMART, said on Monday it would back Union Pacific's proposed $85 billion merger with Norfolk Southern after securing job protection guarantees for its members.
